availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Charles Gosnell (Cairo, Alexander County, Illinois, plasterer)

body.p: Cairo, Alexander County, Illinois, plasterer. Kentucky native. Married to Malvina Gosnell. Farmer in Green County, Kentucky, in 1860. Plasterer in Cairo, Alexander County, Illinois, in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 1, p. 690.
"Charles Gosnell (1830-1906," Find A Grave, Memorial 101479671, accessed June 6, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/101479671.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Jefferson County, IL, July 1863, p. 85.
